participant_1.background:
I worked on building the latest drone model for my company.
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas.
I live far from my family, but I love them.
My mornings consist of listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers while I get ready for the day.
i am a very tall woman.

participant_2.background:
I collect memories of my vacations, including the deer I saw on Lake Michigan.
I enjoy lifting weights on my days off to stay in shape.
i start an internship in engineering later this year.
i like to make fresh pies.
i drive only toyota.

content.text: I am doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing well too. I just got back from a long weekend at the lake.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love going to the lake. Did you do anything fun there?
We went swimming, fishing, and hiking. We also had a bonfire and roasted marshmallows.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could have gone.
You should come with us next time!
I would love to! I'm sure we'd have a lot of fun.
Great! We'll have to plan something soon.
Sounds good! In the meantime, I'm going to go make some fresh apple pie.
Oh, that sounds delicious! I love apple pie.
It's my favorite. I'm going to make it with my new pie crust recipe.
I'm sure it will be great! I love trying new recipes.
Me too! I'm always looking for new ways to cook.
Well, I'm going to let you get to it. Enjoy your pie!
